idea-plugin.name: Readable test names
idea-plugin.description:
Additional rename refactoring that renames methods from camel cased names to underscored names.
'ThisIsATestMethod' will become 'This_Is_A_Test_Method'

I have personally mapped it to CMD+OPTION+R on my mac.
idea-plugin.change-notes: v1.0 - Can refactor test methods. Also adds additional suggestion with "test_" prefix. (Note that this plugin has only been tested on *.java files)
